thread.title: Indian stock market opens flat, TCS stock up nearly 4% after strong result - Worldnews.com
thread.title_full: Indian stock market opens flat, TCS stock up nearly 4% after strong result - Worldnews.com

title: Indian stock market opens flat, TCS stock up nearly 4% after strong result - Worldnews.com
text: The Indian stock market opened flat on Friday as buying was seen in the IT sector after strong Q3 results of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), which saw its stock jumping 3.7 per cent at Rs 4,186 apiece in early trade. The IT sector was trading with a gain of more than 2 per cent. At around 9.34 am, Sensex was
